name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a seasoned Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I am adept in **Go**, **Java**, **Kotlin**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and CI/CD processes, ensuring efficient software delivery and system reliability. My robust background in microservices architecture, API development, and data processing, including both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, enables me to craft scalable and resilient applications. I employ ETL techniques and data modeling strategies to drive insights and enhance performance, all while adhering to clean code principles and test-driven development (TDD).
Beyond technical acumen, my leadership in agile environments has fostered effective teamwork and communication. I have a proven track record of integrating **Azure DevOps** to streamline workflows and deploying applications that leverage artificial intelligence for innovative solutions. My initiative in driving projects has consistently resulted in high-performance outcomes, particularly in sectors demanding compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
